title: Clean hydrogen potential for carbon-neutral copper mining
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE02823F, Paper
Iuliia Kukula, Ivan Ermanoski, Ellen B. Stechel
Increasing electrification and renewable energy expansion will drive up copper demand and copper mining energy consumption and emissions. Clean hydrogen can replace fossil fuels, facilitating carbon neutrality in copper mining.
